bio: I'm a simple Optimism user. I like to test ecosystem and take part in various pools.
contributionDescription:
I regularly use and test the Optimism ecosystem and donate to USDC to support ecosystem projects. 

By actively using the Optimism ecosystem, I am not only help test its functionality but also demonstrate its practical applications. This usage provides valuable feedback to the development teams, which can lead to improvements and refinements in the platform.

And of course, I'm everytime engaged in Optimism Agora!
impactDescription:
By regularly using and testing the Optimism ecosystem, I am contributing to its growth and improvement. My actions help identify any issues, bugs, or vulnerabilities, which can be addressed and resolved by the development team.

Donating USDC to support ecosystem projects provides them with the financial resources needed for development, research, and maintenance. This financial contribution is crucial for the sustainability and growth of the ecosystem.
pwCategorySuggestions: Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Layer 2 Scaling, Community Building
